= Supported consoles =

Any of the following are supported:

 * Nintendo !GameCube (PAL or NTSC)
 * Nintendo Wii (without the recent [WiiSystemUpdate Wii system update])

= Supported launch methods =

Any of the following are supported:

 * Datel SD Media Launcher.
 * Datel Action Replay MAX (old version)

= Software requirements =

The software requirements depend on what launch method you want to use.

 * [SDMediaLauncherRequirements SD Media Launcher requirements]
 * [ActionReplayRequirements Action Replay requirements]
